title: Faber-Castell Pitt Charcoal 24 Piece Set
description:
The versatile, gray-blue hue of charcoal has been treasured by artists for ages. Be a part of the time-honored tradition with this 24 piece set. Pencils come in three grades of hardness: soft, medium, and hard. Tin includes three charcoal pencils, three wax-free charcoal pencils, eight compressed charcoal sticks, eight natural charcoal sticks, kneadable eraser and paper wiper. Made in Germany. 

8 1/2 x 7 1/2 in. 

Recommended for ages 16 and up
